## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                              | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | Icon for the side menu item              | `string`  | `''`    |
| `selected` | `selected` | Sets the button as into a selected state | `boolean` | `false` |
